title: Application-Oriented Input Design in System Identification: Optimal Input Design for Control
abstract: Model-based control design plays a key role in today's industrial practice, and industry demands cuttingedge methods for identifying the necessary models. However, additional tools are needed to handle the increasingly stringent conditions on cost and performance related to identifying the models.
